subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the wake of Tuesday night’s narrowly averted Mets-Brewers beanball battle and the increased awareness of player safety issues in other sports, some are calling for baseball’s unwritten rules to be rewritten.
snippet: In the wake of Tuesday night’s narrowly averted Mets-Brewers beanball battle and the increased awareness of player safety issues in other sports, some are calling for baseball’s unwritten rules to be rewritten.
